channel.title: The Street Keeps Taking. Give Hanif the Power to Stop It. on Crash Count
channel.description: Recent content in The Street Keeps Taking. Give Hanif the Power to Stop It. on Crash Count

item.title: Council District 39 — Crash 4785728 on 2025-01-13
item.description: January 13, 2025 — 11:30 a.m. — Brooklyn-Queens Expressway: A 73-year-old man slumped behind the wheel, unconscious. His SUV veered left, striking another. Chest crushed, he died still belted in. Illness took him first. The crash finished what his body had begun.

item.title: Council District 39 — Crash 4770876 on 2024-11-12
item.description: November 12, 5:40 p.m., Brooklyn — A motorcycle struck the side of a sedan near 5th Avenue and 39th. A 52-year-old woman, helmeted, crushed in the leg. Two vehicles northbound. One moved to park. One followed too close.

item.title: Council District 39 — Crash 4764626 on 2024-10-17
item.description: October 17, 5:20 p.m., Union Street, Brooklyn — A 41-year-old woman on a westbound bike was ejected, struck head-first. Her helmet held, but blood ran. She was conscious. The sign was missed. The street did not forgive.

item.title: Council District 39 — Crash 4749410 on 2024-08-19
item.description: August 19, 2024, 1:54 p.m. — On Ditmas Avenue, a box truck turned right. A 16-year-old boy on a Hurley e-bike was crushed. No helmet. No license. Chest crushed. Ejected. Dead on the street. The truck was undamaged.

item.title: Council District 39 — Crash 4735930 on 2024-06-26
item.description: June 26, 11:33 a.m., Bond and Butler, Brooklyn — An 83-year-old woman, crossing without a signal, was struck and killed by a northbound dump truck making a right turn. The truck bore no damage. Her body bore all of it.

item.title: Council District 39 — Crash 4727274 on 2024-05-23
item.description: May 23, 2024, 8:14 p.m. — Two sedans met at 8th Avenue and Union. Metal screamed. A 46-year-old man, no belt, crushed at the knee. Both drivers distracted. The street held the silence after.

item.title: Council District 39 — Crash 4720231 on 2024-04-23
item.description: April 23, 2024 – 2:30 PM – Park Circle, Coney Island Ave: A 17-year-old boy on a bike, no helmet, struck by an SUV. Thrown. Cut deep. Whole body hurt. Shock in his eyes. Steel met flesh. The road did not forgive.

item.title: Council District 39 — Crash 4713401 on 2024-03-29
item.description: March 29, 2024, 3:30 p.m. — Brooklyn, 14th Avenue and 39th Street. A 74-year-old woman crossed against the light. A northbound Honda SUV struck her head-on. She died there, on the pavement, with crush wounds and head trauma.

item.title: Council District 39 — Crash 4699806 on 2024-02-03
item.description: Feb 3, 2024 – Carroll Street, Brooklyn – A moped rider, unlicensed and unprotected, was ejected and crushed beneath a Genesis SUV. The SUV turned left. The moped turned right. Traffic control was ignored. Blood on the pavement. A leg broken.

item.title: Council District 39 — Crash 4699808 on 2024-02-03
item.description: February 3, 2024 — Brooklyn, 2:30 p.m. An 83-year-old man, crossing Union Street with the signal, struck by a turning taxi. Head wound. Severe bleeding. He stood at the intersection. The cab did not yield.

item.title: Council District 39 — Crash 4691871 on 2024-01-01
item.description: January 1, 6:54 a.m. — A Jeep sedan lost a tire on the BQE. Seven aboard. The front end crumpled. A man in the right rear screamed. His leg crushed. He wore a harness. He sat in shock.

item.title: Council District 39 — Crash 4690798 on 2023-12-28
item.description: Before dawn on Flatbush Avenue, a taxi struck a 72-year-old woman crossing against the signal. The front end caved her in. She died there, at the intersection, her body broken. The street was quiet again by sunrise.

item.title: Council District 39 — Crash 4687736 on 2023-12-06
item.description: December 6, 6:29 p.m., Ocean Avenue, Brooklyn — A 90-year-old woman, crossing with the signal, struck by a turning sedan. The car hit head-on. She fell with head wounds and deep cuts. She was conscious. The car kept turning.

item.title: Council District 39 — Crash 4672391 on 2023-10-20
item.description: October 20, 10:30 a.m. — Sterling Place, Brooklyn. A man on a bike, 31, was thrown from his ride. His arm torn. Blood on the pavement. An SUV stood still. A passenger looked away. The crash did not touch the car.

item.title: Council District 39 — Crash 4666944 on 2023-10-01
item.description: October 1, 2023 – 11:40 p.m. – Flatbush Avenue, Brooklyn: An electric sedan struck a parked Jeep. The driver, unbelted, flew from the seat. A woman in back, helmeted, was torn at the leg. Both lay bleeding, conscious, in the dark.

item.title: Council District 39 — Crash 4655140 on 2023-08-18
item.description: 3:22 a.m., Atlantic Avenue and Court Street—Two sedans met at speed. Metal tore. An 18-year-old woman sat front right, belted in. She died. The night held her still while the sirens came too late.

item.title: Council District 39 — Crash 4643200 on 2023-06-30
item.description: June 30, 2023 – 3:29 PM – Caton Avenue, Brooklyn: A 35-year-old unlicensed man on a ZNEN motorcycle struck the side of an SUV. He flew from the bike, hit head-first, died there on Dahill Road. No helmet.

item.title: Council District 39 — Crash 4634151 on 2023-05-31
item.description: 6:13 a.m., Flatbush Avenue. A sedan turned across the lane. A scooter struck its front. The rider flew, hit the pavement. Blood poured from his leg. No helmet. No armor. Just asphalt, steel, and a man trying to go straight.

item.title: Council District 39 — Crash 4624826 on 2023-04-29
item.description: April 29, 2023, 11:15 p.m. — On 4th Avenue near 6th Street, a southbound e-bike struck a 38-year-old woman. She was not in the roadway. The front end hit her head. She bled from deep cuts. She stayed conscious.

item.title: Council District 39 — Crash 4607398 on 2023-02-17
item.description: Feb 17, 2023, 10:16 p.m. — Hicks Street, Brooklyn. A southbound Lexus struck a 36-year-old man walking with traffic. The sedan’s front crushed forward. The man bled from the head. He lay at the intersection, hurt and silent.

item.title: Council District 39 — Crash 4606313 on 2023-02-12
item.description: Feb 12, 7:15 p.m. — Coney Island Avenue, Brooklyn. A 2019 Toyota slammed into two stopped sedans. Brakes failed. A 51-year-old man, belted in the driver’s seat, suffered crush wounds to the face. Six others sat still.

item.title: Council District 39 — Crash 4581818 on 2022-11-12
item.description: November 12, 2022 – Brooklyn, 3:54 p.m. A Honda SUV struck the rear of a stopped Kia. A 70-year-old woman in the front seat was conscious, her back injured. She reported an amputation. Both drivers were distracted.

item.title: Council District 39 — Crash 4580866 on 2022-11-09
item.description: Nov 9, 10:50 a.m. — Hicks Street, Brooklyn. A man, 38, found dead behind the wheel of a parked 2022 Lexus. Head injury. Child restraint was the only safety gear. No movement. No sound. Just stillness in the driver’s seat.

item.title: Council District 39 — Crash 4580944 on 2022-11-09
item.description: Nov 9, 12:45 p.m. — Saint Marks Place, Brooklyn. A speeding sedan tore through parked cars. Eight times, the same young man was listed: 22, injured, no seatbelt, crush wounds to his arm. Metal screamed. The street did not forget.

item.title: Council District 39 — Crash 4572613 on 2022-10-12
item.description: 7:00 AM, Oct 12, 2022 — Parkside Avenue: A 25-year-old woman on a bike, eastbound, collided with a diesel tractor truck. She was ejected, struck across her body, and killed. Her bike was demolished. The truck showed no damage.

item.title: Council District 39 — Crash 4567647 on 2022-09-18
item.description: 12:33 a.m., 3rd Avenue, Brooklyn. A sedan struck the rear of a parked diesel truck. The man inside, 35, was not ejected. He cried out in pain. His back hurt. The report marked him: “Apparent Death.” Alcohol was involved.

item.title: Council District 39 — Crash 4561432 on 2022-09-05
item.description: Sept 5, 2022 – 1:11 p.m. – Prospect Park Southwest, Brooklyn: Two bikes met at speed. One rider, 23, hit the pavement hard. No helmet. Blood on the leg. Flesh torn. He stayed conscious. The street held him in silence.

item.title: Council District 39 — Crash 4543764 on 2022-07-01
item.description: July 1, 2022, 6:45 p.m. — Caton Avenue, Brooklyn. A man on an e-bike struck the side of a parked Kia. The front of the bike crumpled. The rider, 61, died at the scene. The street did not speak.

item.title: Council District 39 — Crash 4537823 on 2022-06-15
item.description: June 15, 8:49 a.m., 5th Street and 4th Avenue, Brooklyn — A sedan turned left. A man on a bike rode straight. Metal struck flesh. He flew. Landed face-first. Blood ran. He was 58. He was conscious.

item.title: Council District 39 — Crash 4524747 on 2022-05-04
item.description: May 4, 2022, 7:50 p.m. — Union Street, Brooklyn. A taxi struck an eastbound e-scooter. The rider, 40, was ejected. No helmet. Blood poured from his arm. The brakes had failed. He lay conscious on the pavement.

item.title: Background for Unknown
item.description: Timeline Events Wins primary on safe-streets platform Op-ed: “Crossing the Street” manifesto Urges e-bikes access in Prospect Park Cyclist killed; Hanif mobilizes response 9th Street “die-in” and safety pledge Backs Sammy’s Law for 20 MPH streets Fatal Borough Park crash and call to action Atlantic Avenue safety plan announced Event 9 Guides Open Streets compromise in Park Slope
